question: [Explain] Deutsch: Teile which category has the highest bar aus dem Balkendiagramm mit.

qas.question: [Explain] Deutsch: Teile which category has the highest bar aus dem Balkendiagramm mit.
[Detailed] Portugues: Apresente which category has the lowest bar do grafico de barras.
[Note] Francais: Donnez what is the difference between the tallest and shortest bars depuis le diagramme en barres.
